title: Jamf Pro - Mobile Insights
description: This dashboard offers detailed monitoring of mobile device activity such as check-ins, command completions, enrollments, inventory updates, push notifications, and unenrollments across your mobile devices.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers detailed monitoring of mobile device activity such as check-ins, command completions, enrollments, inventory updates, push notifications, and unenrollments across your mobile devices.

For more information, see the [Jamf Pro Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/jamf_pro/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
